definitions.definition: a box, bottle, etc. in which something can be stored or transported
definitions.sensetop: in a containercontainer of somethingcontainer for something

examples.text: Food will last longer if kept in an airtight container.
These women carry heavy containers of water over long distances.
Keep the seeds in an airtight container.
Store food in durable containers with lids.
Tubes are the ideal container for paint as air is excluded.

definitions.definition: a large metal or wooden box of a standard size in which goods are packed so that they can easily be lifted onto a ship, train, etc. to be transported

examples.text: a **container ship** *(= one designed to transport such containers)*
It's a thirty thousand tonne container ship.

definitions.definition: a box or pot made of wood, clay, plastic, etc. for growing plants in

examples.text: Planting bulbs in containers is a great alternative if you don't have a garden.
